pre_caption: This is an aerial view of a city riverfront on a sunny day. A large drawbridge with several military tanks on it spans the water. In the background, modern buildings line the river, and a large splash is visible near the bank.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
